title: Electric Potential at P due to 2 source charges

content.question: The electric potential at <math alttext="x equals 6 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mtext> cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is most nearly

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
